layout.singingstanza: Oh, con -- quer me dear Lord, And nev -- er let me win. May Thou de -- feat me all the time Till I'm sub -- dued with -- in. Con -- quer me dear Lord, Nev -- er let me win; Oh, de -- feat me all the time Till I'm sub -- dued with -- in.

lyrics.stanza: Oh, conquer me dear Lord, And never let me win. May Thou defeat me all the time Till I'm subdued within.
Conquer me dear Lord, Never let me win; Oh, defeat me all the time Till I'm subdued within.
I, once Thine enemy, Was captured, Lord, by Thee; Yet Thee I hold, rebelliously, As captive unto me.
Defeated, Lord, by Thee, Thy prisoner I'd be. Yet when Thou would'st make home in me, I oft imprison Thee.
Though conquered Lord, by Thee, My old man liveth still. O, come and be my person, Lord, In mind, emotion, will.
Make me a captive, Lord And then I shall be free; Break through, have Thine own way in me For Thine economy.
